actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment Opportunities.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the closure of the General Motors Corporation automotive plants in Fremont and South Gate, California.

summary.text: Urges the General Motors Corporation to proceed expeditiously to consider and take action on a solution to enable the South Gate and Fremont plants to continue operation. Urges the California automotive industry to maintain full employment and production.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the closure of the General Motors Corporation automotive plants in Fremont and South Gate, California.
